features: 💗 【More Brightness】【This product has LZHOME's unique design, appearance and functionality, please check if it is LZHOME brand before purchasing.】Using More high quality LED inside, this car detailing hexagon light system produce 110 lumens per watt, up to 26400 lumens, total 240W. “CRI >85” which will make your garage or work bench looks very good and bright. Light color is 5000K(Nature white) which is the best color temperature for daylight using, providing the best car lighting experience.

💗【Bigger Size & Soft Light】The light emitting surface of the garage light is designed wider, and the style is larger than other products. The wider light emitting surface will make the hexagon garage lights look more beautiful, and the light emitting will be more soft. At the same time, such a large style also allows the product power to be larger and brighter than other lights but safter.

💗【Special Safety Design & Durable】Compared with others, Our hexagon light have been redesigned the connector part. The garage lamp using 3PIN connecting pins, which have been specially built deep inside. By this design, it is impossible to touch these connect pins during installation like others, So NO RISK of electric shock! This led garage light is made of high-quality PC material, which provides higher strength but more lighter ,so it is easy for installation .

💗【Easy Installation & More Accessories】By providing Y/V connector, this car detailing light can be easily be assembled and change. Also you can buy more sets to assemble a bigger hexagon light, super DIY choice. Every set ,we provide more accessories : One 5ft long power cable with US plug ; One power cable for hard wired; 25pcs led tube(one more than needed) ;12pcs V connector(one more than needed) ; 10pcs Y connector(one more than needed) and other accessories like screws and so on .

💗【Long Lifespan & 2 Year Warranty】The Lifespan of this Ceiling Garage lighting is more than 50,000 hours. Greatly reduce maintenance costs. LZHOME offers 2-year limited warranty, contact us if you have any issue about the light.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: LED SHOP LIGHT This is a hexagon patterned Garage light LED workshop lighting system can be mounted on the wall and ceiling use screws and zippers. The light spread from the pattern gives you a comfortable visual experience while illuminating an entire garage bay. Which brings the idea of lighting up your space to a whole new level.

DIY diversity installation effect: Tubes can be installed into cool light shapes according to personal preference, creating the perfect cool and premium ambience for your space. If you're looking to light up your garage, or you have a shop that needs some dressing up, these lights are the answer. These lights are extremely popular in the automotive industry for dealerships, detailing shops, car washes, vinyl wrap shops, and paint and auto body shops. They are also popular in retail shops, gyms.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It looked so elegant
reviews.reviewText: I installed this in my garage. I liked how sturdy this product is. I wasn’t able to install this at once and the box was exposed to sun and rain, I thought I ruined it. To my surprise when I opened the box, the materials is well built. Thick and in very good quality. It is very easy to attach together. I am the only one installing this with no help and it took me about 2 hours, with no experience whatsoever. I just followed the manual that comes with it. I still have a lot of extra LED light in the box after I used up the hexagons for my design. I love how it lit up my garage. It is super bright even if I didn’t use all of it. The hexagons are the right size for my design. I get a lot of great comments from friends, neighbors, and families when they see my garage. I would definitely recommend this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Was reluctant to jump on the ‘Hex Light’ bandwagon, but was TOTALLY WORTH IT!
reviews.reviewText: Had just moved in with my Fiancé and she gave me free rein in the garage. Lights needed upgrading. Always thought the ‘Hex Lights’ were an overhyped trend but after calculating out quality shop lights and price per lumen, I decided to try these out. Also didn’t want to deal with the attic running Romex and installing tons of Light Fixtures. These being plug and play made it easy!Long story short, these things are quality! Easy to install overall! Super bright! Lite enough to use drywall screws! They legit thought of the details with these. The recessed plug ins, the solid snap you feel when they are connected properly, the rigidity of each light and connector. Plus they give you at least 1 extra light just in case (I got 1 extra with the first pack and 2 with the other), plus extra connectors for multiple designs!With installation, I made sure to measure since I knew these would be a show piece. Once you install the first Hex, the rest are easy. Again, they are super lite, enough that I just used quality drywall screws (not the included anchor screws) and made sure not to strip them. Trust me, they are solid! I also left the protective film on each lite and pulled the ends back enough to plug the connector in, then I folded the film over the connector for that extra hold. But, they snap in very well, enough that while I had 2 sides of a hex screwed up, I plugged in the other 4 sides as a whole and they held up enough while I reached for the screw gun. I also bought a Light Socket Adapter that gave me 2 plugs so that they’d work with the lite switch without having to rewire anything!Overall, well worth the money. I’d by more just for additional design appeal, but these things are bright enough as it is!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars PHENOMENAL lighting option
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love these. Assembly was quick and painless, you'll definitely need some help putting them up though. The hex look is flawless and flattering and the leds are bright enough to see everything needed while working on the bikes and cars in the garage with no issue. One would've been enough, but we purchased 2 so there would be minimal shadows for a better view (we use both sides to work on vehicles.) Definitely recommend, and at a price that's affordable for this kind of lighting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: These lights brought a whole different life to my garage. When working on cars or anything really, there is no such thing as too much light. They are so bright I have two 6 foot led bars in the ceiling that are 10000 lumens each. After installing the hex lights I can’t even notice the light bars. They make even my cluttered garage look pretty. I have 3 sets to give me that full range across the ceiling and it comes with everything you need to keep linking more together. Customer service is very helpful and replies quickly over email. Installing all 3 sets took only an hour or 2 it’s really easy for a one person job. Once you get your first measurement in to make it all aligned they don’t have much flex so you will stay on mark. When I went to expand later it was as easy as disconnecting the 2 way adding a 3 way and connecting more. I would highly recommend this to any car guy or wood workers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars New Gym lights.
reviews.reviewText: These lights are amazing! Items were packaged well and all items accounted for. Install was a breeze. Only complaint is it would be nice if they offered a longer plug in cord. Other than that I highly recommend and these lights are super bright!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lived up to my expectations
reviews.reviewText: Light level and ease of installation were great. I would highly recommend this product. Only minor complaint is that the screws provided were cheap and stripped almost instantly. It didn't matter because I used strip ties to finish the install. Looks great and provides a bunch of light. I have shared the link and probably gotten three other people to buy this light in the two weeks that it has been installed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Will definitely lighten your space up
reviews.reviewText: I always found my garage dark. Bought one of these and installed it. Man did it brighten everything up. This first one was a difficult install, because the ceiling was only rafters and I had to add crossbeams to secure it properly. Anyway after seeing how nice it brightened everything up, I bought two more (one for each of the remaining garage bays)These next two were really easy to install because I could anchor them into drywall (took a little over an hour each) and didn't have to add a bunch of crossbeam supports. Easily did this by myself these parts are incredibly light. I have the central garage bay direct wired into the ceiling lights, and the left and right wings connected to their garage door opener (https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0B24TX1QG?ref=ppx_yo2ov_dt_b_product_details&th=1) Very happy with the final outcome.One warning the design is expected to be mounted flush to the rafters or drywall (they provide simple anchors) directly. Because I had to work around the garage opener supports, I ended up getting 3 1/4 inch #8 screws and 2" spacers to suspend this below the supports.So be aware of this when you order. Don't get one too big or you will encounter the same issue. I could have gone smaller, but in the winter I do a lot of projects and wanted the light.
Super bright lights and cool design. You can shape them many different ways. Would repurchase.

The media could not be loaded. product is really cool and so easy to assemble. havent fully installed them yet but looking forward to the final product. the lights light up my entire garage with no dark spots which is amazing. now hopefully they withstand the test of time.
Just did a 3 hexagon with this kit and it is bright! Love it I ordered 3 more kit!!
